Identity.Name: Dontu, The Undefeated
Identity.Basic_Description: A  berserker in apocolyptic style heavy armor with a number of hilts on their belt

Strategic Commander.Ability: Dontu can spend one energy to reroll up to 2 attack die.

Frontline Commander.Ability: Any unit attacking a unit adjacent to Dontu may reroll up to 1 attack die during combat.
